name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 23, Japanese Foreign Minister Yoshifumi Takushi visited China and asked China to strengthen the control of malicious online posts.
Chinese Foreign Ministry responded: There is no so-called "anti-Japanese education" in China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing News reported: A closed youth psychological education institution called "Fuhe" in Bao'an District, Shenzhen was exposed to abuse students. The institution promised to help depressed teenagers "perfectly transform" at a high fee of 25,000 yuan per month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Mq9GJNpo8E

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 22, Changsha, Hunan. A netizen posted a video claiming that an instructor at the Laodong Road Fire Rescue Station of the Tianxin District Fire Brigade secretly added oil from the fire station into his car.
On September 23, the office staff of the Changsha Tianxin District Fire Rescue Brigade responded that the incident was under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen from Huxia Village, Dongzhuang Town, Xiuyu District, Putian City, Fujian Province posted a video. Due to problems in the certificate application in 1997, the land certificate of the family's house was under the name of the great uncle, while the land certificate of the other house of the great uncle was under the name of the deceased grandfather. After repeated feedback, the land certificates were not allowed to be changed back to their respective names, resulting in the inability to rebuild the dilapidated houses. Because of rain and typhoons, tiles and soil fell in the house and the walls cracked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, B station blogger "Liu Yu-Network Security" was searching for hidden cameras in hotels and B&Bs in Shijiazhuang. During the search, he was insulted and beaten by the boss and his men, and was also surrounded at the door of the police station. The owner of one of the B&Bs admitted that the camera was connected to his mobile phone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Affected by this year's 13th typhoon "Bebejia", heavy rains fell continuously at the junction of Jiangsu, Shandong, Henan and Anhui provinces on September 17 and 18. The old Yellow River course at the junction of Shandong, Anhui and Henan quickly accumulated water. In addition, the old course had not been maintained since the Yellow River was diverted in 1855, and the embankments were quickly washed away by the floods and breached everywhere. Shandong Heze, Shandong Shanxian, Henan Shangqiu, Henan Xiayi, Henan Yucheng, Henan, Henan Yongcheng, Anhui Xiaoxian, Anhui Dangshan, Anhui, Anhui Suzhou and other places were affected, among which Suzhou Xiaoxian was affected by the breach of the embankment and suffered the most severe floods.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, at Shanghai Disneyland, Winnie the Pooh was knocked to the ground by a tourist during a parade. He was then helped away by staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 23, Qingdao, Shandong. Huang Bo returned to Qingdao to record a program and was stopped by passers-by and asked for a job. "I want to beg you, can you help me find a good job and save me?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, the Chinese Embassy in Israel issued a special reminder, reminding Chinese citizens not to travel to Israel for the time being, and Chinese citizens in Israel are requested to return home as soon as possible or move to safe areas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Huawei tri-fold phone, which was once sold for more than 300,000 yuan, has recently been exposed to a "valanche" of scalper prices, from more than 100,000 yuan to 4,000 yuan. It has even reached the point where "the price changes every hour. If you want to buy, I will definitely have the product; but if you want to sell it, I will never accept it." Scalpers have "fainted in the toilet crying."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of September 23, Jinan, Shandong. A large number of demolition workers entered Wanglu Village to carry out forced demolition. During the demolition, the villagers fired fireworks to resist. Finally, the local government compromised under everyone's resistance, and the victorious villagers shouted "Long live the Communist Party!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, a murder occurred in Jiuxi Village, Wangbao Town, Qidong City, Jiangsu Province. A female cadre was killed. The suspect committed suicide on the day of the murder. Insiders: The reason was that the female cadre learned that the low-income household had a deposit of 20,000 yuan and reported it to the brigade, and then cancelled the low-income household benefits, which led to the murder.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Nanjing University Ph.D. Tang Jiafeng wrote that after the pager explosion in Lebanon, he immediately asked his family to conduct a comprehensive inspection of the electronic products at home. He also said that he and his family had reserved Huawei's three-fold mobile phone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa announced that in response to the stabbing death of a Japanese boy in Shenzhen, 43 million yen will be allocated to strengthen security in 12 schools in Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa held talks with Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi at the United Nations headquarters. However, photos released by the Chinese government sparked heated discussions, showing that Wang Yi gave people a sense of superiority. Netizens responded, "This is educating children."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, it was reported that Zhang Zulin, former vice governor of Yunnan Province, was arrested on suspicion of bribery. It is reported that he had vowed at the closing ceremony of the first session of the 13th Kunming Municipal People's Congress in 2011, "I must be an honest mayor," "I will not be tainted by unhealthy practices, I will not take ill-gotten gains, I will not do anything illegal. I will make up for my shortcomings with diligence, gather strength with harmony, and gain authority with integrity. I will not be a mediocre official, a corrupt official, or a peace officer."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 23, Luoyang, Henan. A sign outside an antique calligraphy and painting shop reads, "No one with an iPhone 16 is allowed to enter this store. Don't ask me why. Just search online. Maybe it won't explode. It may explode someday."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, multiple sources have pointed out that Urumqi, Xinjiang is "optimizing" community workers who are not on the payroll. Some local netizens said that the "optimization" in their area has been completed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese Embassy in Japan: The National Day holiday is approaching. In view of the current situation, we remind our compatriots in Japan and Chinese citizens who plan to travel to Japan to raise their awareness of prevention and ensure travel safety. In case of disputes, express your demands rationally and safeguard your legitimate rights and interests through negotiation or legal means.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 23, Guangdong. The man said he had not found a job for two months, and today he met someone who was also looking for a job on the subway. The responses from netizens were also full of despair, and everyone reflected on the dilemma of not being able to find a job for several months in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, the man posted a video mockingly saying, "I love my country, so I don't wear clothes, because many textile machines are imported; I love my country, so I never breathe, because the carbon cycle will make me breathe in foreign air; I love my country, so I am not controlled by gravity, because gravity was discovered by Newton; because I love my country, I use leaves to cover my body, use a compass when I go out, and drill wood to make fire."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of September 24, a certain unit held a party day activity on the tram in Sanya, singing red songs, welcoming the National Day, and live-streaming on Douyin, engaging in formalism. Netizens posted barrages to express their dissatisfaction, and later someone came to notify them to close the comments in the live broadcast room.
It is understood that the predicted daily passenger flow of the Sanya tram project is more than 35,000, but the actual passenger flow is only more than 2,000, and it has been in a loss-making state.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, according to the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission, Sun Yuning, member of the Party Committee and Deputy Director of the General Administration of Customs, is suspected of serious violations of discipline and laws and is currently undergoing disciplinary review and supervisory investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 21, a fall-in-a-well accident occurred in the Longhu Chunjiang Tianjing Community in Xi'an. An 8-year-old girl was playing hide-and-seek with several other children in the courtyard of the community after attending a classmate's birthday party. She fell into a fire-fighting well seven or eight meters deep in the green belt and died. The child was only 8 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, an 8-year-old boy in Baota District, Yan'an, Shaanxi, fell into a septic tank under construction and died, which attracted attention. The aunt of the deceased boy said that the incident happened on September 21. The child's grandmother (grandmother) had just returned with the child and sat downstairs of her house, and the child disappeared in a blink of an eye. "The property was under construction that day, and there were no protective measures around. The wellhead was covered with plastic sheeting, and the child fell in and drowned." The aunt of the deceased boy said, "My mother is blaming herself now." A local official involved in the handling said that the community is cooperating with the police to handle the matter, "The police and the property have talked, and we will see how to mediate at that time."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, the Zion Church issued a "prayer letter", saying that on the morning of the 22nd, dozens of believers in Beitaipingzhuang, Haidian District, Beijing, were worshiping God together when they were broken into by the local Ethnic and Religious Affairs Office, Culture and Tourism Bureau, police station and other departments, and many people were taken away and detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, Osaka Chinese School issued a notice that on September 20, the school received an anonymous email from overseas impersonating a well-known Japanese lawyer threatening to harm children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, Shandong Weifang Jutian Agriculture and Animal Husbandry collapsed and the boss fled. Investors went to the Weifang Municipal Government and District Government to seek help for their rights.
